projects.title: Countries v2
projects.description: Second version of Countries built with TS, React, REST API and Tailwind. It was created after first version in order to see the difference in building SPA's or sites in general with and without modern technologies

image.alt: Screenshot of the Countries v2 project

projects.title: aBay - e-commerce store
projects.description: Full stack app with backend and frontend. It has users, items, cart, user authentication, routing, and more. It was created to learn more about React, Redux, Node.js, Express and MongoDB. It is still in progress and I am working on it in my free time.

projects.title: Calculator without eval()
projects.description: Calculator project built without eval() function, which is considered as a bad practice. It was created in VanillaJS, HTML and CSS.
